i am 5'7", 140lbs, 34b with that middle aged spare tire forming. i got the large size and it fits great. the mesh fabric is soft and not scratchy. i have a fairly long torso and the large does not pull too tight like some can. the "tube top" part is nice and attached to the mesh part well, not tight and digging in or lose and floppy within the shirt. because i ordered this thru vine and was given a free product to review i was limited to the lighter brown color for the size L i was needing, it's not my favorite color for my skin tone, but i will probably spend my own money and order another color.

This top is really pretty, but I had a few mixed feelings about it. The sheer mesh feels a bit thin and I ran into a small fit issue. The fabric coverage in the front was lower than I expected, so it didn't cover me quite as much as I would've liked. I think this is because of my particular body type though. I did really like how soft the inner fabric feels against the skin - it's super comfortable and the ruching on the sides is really flattering. Also, the turtleneck is comfortable and doesn't feel too tight around the neck. I got my usual size Medium, and it actually feels like a better fit than what the sizing chart suggested (which was a Large). Overall, while I had a few minor issues, it's still a really pretty top that you can dress up with jeans.

I almost sized up with this mesh top, but am glad I didn’t. It stretches a lot and the ruching is flattering. I’m 5’7”, 115lbs, 34C, 27”Waist, got a Small. I love almost everything. Except the color. I choose the Light Tan, which isn’t as dark as it looks. When I got it, I thought it was pantyhose in the clear bag -same color. The shade looks awful with my pale complexion, plus…it looks like pantyhose. If you’ve got a darker skin tone, this color will probably look really good. But, on me, no. Such a bummer because it’s an all around fabulous top.
